Bash(git -C /mnt/c/Users/br8kw/Github/seh commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add CLAUDE.md for Claude Code guidance

Provides project overview, run commands, architecture goals, and reference
resources for AI-assisted development.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /mnt/c/Users/br8kw/Github/seh commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add project documentation and configuration

- Add requirements documentation \(docs/REQUIREMENTS.md\)
- Add Claude Code agents \(code-reviewer, debugger\) and skills \(architect, handoff\)
- Add GitHub issue templates \(bug report, feature request\)
- Normalize line endings in existing files

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement SolarEdge Harvest application

Add complete Python application to download SolarEdge monitoring data
and store it in a relational database \(SQLite, PostgreSQL, MariaDB\).

Features:
- Async API client with rate limiting \(3 concurrent, 300/day\)
- SQLAlchemy ORM models for sites, equipment, batteries, energy,
  power, meters, and sync metadata
- Incremental sync with configurable overlap buffer
- CLI commands: init-db, check-api, sync, status
- Structured logging with structlog
- Pydantic settings for configuration via environment variables

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update documentation with implementation details and roadmap

- README.md: Comprehensive user guide with quick start, configuration,
  CLI commands, architecture overview, and troubleshooting
- CLAUDE.md: Developer guide with project structure, data flow,
  design patterns, and code style guidelines
- docs/REQUIREMENTS.md: Full requirements tracking with implementation
  status, API endpoint coverage, and technical decisions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
